name: Key West Triathlon and Expo
long_description: The Key West Triathlon and Expo expects to host a maximum of 1,000 participants and some of the sport’s best known triathletes; TRIKW allows you to bask in the warm weather and the waters of the Atlantic Ocean while the rest of the country is experiencing winter. Olympic and Sprint distances.
short_description: The Key West Triathlon and Expo expects to host a maximum of 1,000 participants and some of the sport’s best known triathletes;
